resources.string:
Bluetooth Remote for Reel-to-Reel tape recorders. It replicates functionality of original Technics remote controllers such as RP-9690 and RP-070 (including reverse-play function).
 Connects to remote controller input on Technics RS1500, RS1506 and RS1700 and also on Akai GX-635, GX-636, GX-747, GX-747DBX and GX-77.
 This Bluetooth remote can be wired to other makes and models of tape machines, as long as they are equipped with a "tactile" switches and "active-low" logic. 

 
v.1.0.7 26/09/2021
